description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. This twin-stick shooter mixed with a turn-based card game offers loads of fun! Through three unique game modes, experience the wild west with explosions, teepees, cowboys hats and robots! Play with a friend in multiplayer mode.
description.short: This twin-stick shooter mixed with a turn-based card game offers loads of fun! Through three unique game modes, experience the wild west with explosions, teepees, cowboys hats and robots! Play with a friend in multiplayer mode.
